text_block_list.text: My head hurts...
I slowly awaken from the dark state that surrounded me when—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, have you woken up?
Agnes Tachyon is a horse girl with tremendous ability. Even a rookie trainer like myself has heard of her. But to think that she'd actually stand before me...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: You appear to be a bit confused. You did just regain consciousness, so it's best to not exert yourself.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Go sit on this chair. Make yourself feel at home.
I sat down on the chair just as she said.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Now then, you're probably wondering how you ended up in this situation. Remember anything?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: By the way, I was the one who brought you over here. Therefore, what you need to remember is "how" and "why" you blacked out.
I somehow managed to wrap my throbbing head around this. If I recall correctly, I was walking down the hallway when...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hoooold it! Tachyon-san, wait right hereeeee!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh my. Whatever is the matter, my dear Bakushin O? It's not like your beloved classroom was burned to a crisp.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right! It wasn't burned to a crisp!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So all is well. I shall take my leave.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The class prez commands you to stooooop! There is nothing "well" about this at all!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It may not be burned to a crisp, but it was very much close to being that!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: There was only a little smoke in the corner, no? Would a class president really be this worked up about that?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Um, hmm... Now that you mention it...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Would a benevolent class president forgive something so trivial like filling an entire classroom with smoke...?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Leniency is a virtue, Class President. If that's all, I'll truly be leaving now—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, no! Come to think of it, the teacher said "bring her to me no matter what she says" eight times!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And because of that, I'm not letting you go so easily, Tachyon-saaaan!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! You truly won't get fooled, huh?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm not going to let you get awayyyy! Bakushin bakushiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah! Trainer over there! Don't let Tachyon-san get awayyyy!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm...? Oop!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm, it seems you have recovered some of your memories.
After regaining memory, I realize that the girl in front of me is the one responsible for filling a whole classroom with smoke...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What a strange question to ask. There's no other answer to this than "it's part of my research"!
When Agnes Tachyon said "research," a mysterious sparkle appeared in her eyes.
choice_data_list: (I have a bad feeling about this...)

text_block_list.text: It's best to not get involved with her. I was about to stand up when I realized—
*creak*
I got tied to the chair without noticing...!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Are you the type of person to get so lost in thought that you forget your surroundings? I'm also the same, so I can't say I don't know how that feels.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Nevertheless, I shall kindly advise you to keep an eye on your surroundings at all times.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: After all, you'll never know when you run into a researcher that's looking for a healthy, adult male test subject.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: After all, you'll never know when you run into a researcher that's looking for a healthy, adult female test subject.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: As for me, I'd say it's good luck that you came around. Maybe I should thank God every once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Everyone in the school knows me at this point. I can barely ask anyone to be my test subject before they run away from me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Despite all of that— Hahaha! A total newcomer who has never heard of the rumors about me manifested right in front of my eyes! What are the chances?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And so, little guinea pig—I mean, Rookie Trainer.
choice_data_list: Did you just call me a guinea pig?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: A fully grown adult mustn't worry about such trivial matters!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: That aside, I'll be giving you a— Actually, since you're big and strong, I'll be giving you three pills to take.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ghehehe. Well, that is for you to find out.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it... The worst that could happen is both of your legs would start glowing green for while. Isn't that a cute side effect?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What's more important is being able to observe the effects of the human quadriceps contracting caused by this drug.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: It is a well known fact that horse girls and humans have almost identical body structures. However, by comparing symptoms from both species, it's possible to develop a new—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Tachyon-san... What are you doing this time...?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Why, hello, Cafe! What's the matter? Are you going to help me with my experi—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I am not. I'm only here because the teacher's calling you... It seems they want to discuss your participation in the Selection Race...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: They're waiting. Hurry up and go... Right now...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Alright, alright. I get it. No need to make that scary face at me! Looks like we're out of time. I'll be conducting the tests at a later date.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Until we meet again, Rookie Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: *sigh* I'll untie you...
I am—from the bottom of my heart—so grateful that I've been "saved."
